title: Viola Davis: "I Want to Love Me"
description: Viola Davis on finding herself. It’s hard to imagine the Academy Award-winning actress survived the childhood she did. Bullied at a young age for being different, Viola now realizes the power — and the potency — of those differences. Viola joins Hoda for an intimate conversation on overcoming trauma and how to shape your own future, one leg of the relay race at a time.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (Hoda Kotb, Viola Davis)
